channel.title: CVE Feed for Pixelite -- Events Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pixelite -- Events Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-48326|2024-08-02T21:23:39.499Z -- pixelite -- events%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pixelite Events Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Events Manager: from n/a through 6.4.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-30421|2024-07-08T20:08:25.571Z -- pixelite -- events%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Pixelite Events Manager.This issue affects Events Manager: from n/a through 6.4.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-30515|2024-06-09T11:00:50.411Z -- pixelite -- events%20manager
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Pixelite Events Manager.This issue affects Events Manager: from n/a through 6.4.6.4.
